actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals under age 55 to elect the one-time exclusion of gain from sale of principal residence.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals under age 55 to elect the one-time exclusion of gain from sale or exchange of a principal residence.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals under age 55 to elect the one-time exclusion of gain from sale of principal residence.
